Subject: Weird behavior on the WUI

I'm about 95 hours into a crawl, and Jetty is starting to act
weird. In particular, if I connect to the WUI from a direct URL,

http://localhost:8080/admin/main.jsp

then the images (e.g., Heritrix logo) are not displayed.

If I connect to the server with

http://localhost:8080/

then I get a directory listing containing "WEB-INF/".

This is recent behavior, within the last five or six hours (the last
time I checked all was normal).

Has anyone else seen this kind of behavior?

The runtime-errors.log is empty.

    -tree
